text: Giuseppe Rizza (8 April 1987 – 6 July 2020) was an Italian footballer. He was born in Noto, Italy. From 1995 to 2006, he played for Juventus. Between 2008 and 2012, he played for Livorno. Rizza died on 6 July 2020 in Catania, Italy from a ruptured brain aneurysm, aged 33.Calcio in lutto, è morto Giuseppe Rizza: l’ex Juve aveva 33 anni ==References== Category:1987 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from intracranial aneurysm Category:Footballers from Sicily
title: Giuseppe Rizza
